result.execSummary:
The defendant Megan A Koegel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.
Maintain absolute sobriety.  Submit DNA sample.  AODA and comply.  Complete psychological evaluation and comply.  6 month review.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

ADDRESS INFO for Megan A Koegel
Current: Waunona Trails Lot #60, Portage, WI 53901 United States  (Effective: 03-30-2015)
Prior: 403 Jackson Street, Columbia County Jail, Portage, WI 53901 United States

Defendant Megan A Koegel in court with attorney Ryan T. Frank.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Cases called: 15CF28 & 14CM189.  In 15CF28   Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.  Information filed, reading waived.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant plead no contest to Ct. 1.  with repeater dismissed.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Cts. 2,3, & 4 are dismissed but read in.  Repeater on Ct. 1 dismissed.  Court withheld sentencing placed defendant on probation for 3 years.  $518.00 costs.  Submit DNA sample.   Maintain absolute sobriety.  AODA and comply.  Psychological evaluation and comply.  On 14CM189 defendant plead no contest to Cts. 1 & 2 with repeaters dismissed.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered. Repeaters on Cts. 1 & 2 are dismissed.  Court withheld sentencing placed defendant on probation for 2 years.  $443.00 costs each count.  AODA and comply.  Psychological evalutaion and comply.  Not to go upon the premises of any Wal-Mart in WI.  No restitution was requested.  No jail credit due. Bond on hand is to be applied towards costs.  6 month review.  Defendant may report noon on 3/26/15.
